name: AsteroidMiner
description:
Collect Gold to increase score, see how much you can collect before your lives are all gone.  Warp your ship through space to avoid being crushed by Asteroids.

Controls

Up Arrow - Accelerate

Left/Right Arrow - Turn

C - Shoot

X - Warp

M - Toggle Mute Sound

Credits

Programmer: Thulko

Art: Thulko

Font: Silkscreen by Jason Kottke https://www.fontsquirrel.com/fonts/Silkscreen

Sound Effects: by SubspaceAudio https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

Music: Space Bass by Fupi  https://opengameart.org/content/space-bass

Inspiration: Asteroids by Atari
